OtherOperations.Name: GetExternalSecuritySolutionsByHomeRegion

OtherOperations.Name: GetAllSecuritySolutionsReferenceDataByHomeRegion

OtherOperations.Name: GetTopologiesByHomeRegion
OtherOperations.Description: Gets a list that allows to build a topology view of a subscription and location.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an Azure API Management API if it has been onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs. If an Azure API Management API is onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs, the system will monitor the operations within the Azure API Management API for intrusive behaviors and provide alerts for attacks that have been detected.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Onboard an Azure API Management API to Microsoft Defender for APIs. The system will start monitoring the operations within the Azure Management API for intrusive behaviors and provide alerts for attacks that have been detected.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Onboard an Azure API Management API to Microsoft Defender for APIs. The system will start monitoring the operations within the Azure Management API for intrusive behaviors and provide alerts for attacks that have been detected.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Offboard an Azure API Management API from Microsoft Defender for APIs. The system will stop monitoring the operations within the Azure API Management API for intrusive behaviors.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Gets a list of Azure API Management APIs that have been onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs. If an Azure API Management API is onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs, the system will monitor the operations within the Azure API Management API for intrusive behaviors and provide alerts for attacks that have been detected.

OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Name: GetSecurityCenterApiCollections
OperationsFromResourceGroupExtension.Description: Gets a list of API collections within a resource group that have been onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetSecurityCenterApiCollections
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Gets a list of API collections within a subscription that have been onboarded to Microsoft Defender for APIs.
